named-query.name: usuario.findByUsuario
named-query.query: select o from Usuario o where o.usuUsuario = ?1 and o.institucion.insId=?2 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: permisos.findByUsuario
named-query.query: select o from UsuarioPermiso o where o.usuario.usuId = ?1 and o.regActivo=1 order by o.rol.rolJerarquia desc

named-query.name: usuario.permiso
named-query.query: select o from UsuarioPermiso o where o.rol.rolId=?1 and o.permiso.perId=?2 and o.usuario.usuId=?3 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: institucion.login
named-query.query: select o from Institucion o where o.regActivo=1
